languages.text: "Перо? Достать враново перо на судне непросто. Я узнаю, откуда оно взялось".
"A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."
languages.original_text: "Перо? Достать враново перо на судне непросто. Я узнаю, откуда оно взялось".

traits.locale_text: "A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll find out where it came from."
"A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll find out where it came from."
"A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."
"A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."
"A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."
"A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."

languages.text: « Une plume de corbeau ? Voilà qui est plutôt rare, à bord d'un vaisseau spatial. Je vais tâcher de découvrir d'où elle vient. »
languages.original_text: "A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."

traits.locale_text: « Une plume de corbeau ? Voilà qui est plutôt rare, à bord d'un vaisseau spatial. Je vais tâcher de découvrir d'où elle vient. »

languages.text: «¿Una pluma? Una pluma de cuervo no es algo que se encuentre fácilmente en una nave. Identificaré su procedencia».
languages.original_text: "A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."

traits.locale_text: «¿Una pluma? Una pluma de cuervo no es algo que se encuentre fácilmente en una nave. Identificaré su procedencia».

languages.text: “一根羽毛？这艘船上很难找到乌鸦的羽毛。我可以去调查一下这根羽毛是怎么来的。”
languages.original_text: "A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."

traits.locale_text: “一根羽毛？这艘船上很难找到乌鸦的羽毛。我可以去调查一下这根羽毛是怎么来的。”

languages.text: 「羽？カラスの羽は船では、なかなか珍しいものだ。何処から来たものなのか、調べるよ」
languages.original_text: "A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."

traits.locale_text: 「羽？カラスの羽は船では、なかなか珍しいものだ。何処から来たものなのか、調べるよ」

languages.text: "Eine Feder? Eine Rabenfeder ist auf einem Schiff schwer zu bekommen. Ich versuche, in Erfahrung zubringen, woher sie kommt."
languages.original_text: "A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Feder? Eine Rabenfeder ist auf einem Schiff schwer zu bekommen. Ich versuche, in Erfahrung zubringen, woher sie kommt."

languages.text: "Tüy mü? Kuzgun tüyüne gemide denk gelmek zordur. Nereden geldiğini araştıracağım."
languages.original_text: "A feather? A raven feather is hard to come by on a ship. I'll investigate where it came from."
